Question:
Menya igipimo cya H+(aq) kiri muri 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH. (1 × 10.)
A.1 × 10-10 M
B.1 × 10-9 M
C.1 × 10-3 M
D.1 × 10-5 M
GivenAnswer:
Kugira ngo tumenye igipimo cya H+(aq) muri 1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, dukoresha uburyo bwo kubara pH.

pH = -log[H+]

Phenol ari umwandura utari umukuru, kandi igipimo cye kiri ku 1.0 M. Dukoresha uburyo bwo kubara pH bwa phenol:

Ka = 1.0 × 10-10 (ari ryo gipimo cya Ka cya phenol)
pH = 1/2 log(Ka/[phenol])
pH = 1/2 log(1.0 × 10-10/1.0)
pH = 1/2 (-10)
pH = -5

Noneho, dukoresha uku kubara pH kugira ngo tubane igipimo cya [H+]:

[H+] = 10-pH
[H+] = 10-(-5)
[H+] = 1 × 10-5 M

Kuri iyi ikibazo, igisubizo gikwiye ni D. 1 × 10-5 M.

Question:
Kugenda ku muvuduko wa mbere wa 1.5 × 10-6 m/s, proton yinjira mu karere ka magnetique ihoraho ya magnitude 1.5 T. Niba vector ya mbere y'umuvuduko wa proton ikora imfuruka ya 30° hamwe n'ikibuga cya magnetique, kubara umuvuduko wa proton 4 nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique.

C.1.5 × 10-6 m/s
D.3.0 × 10-6 m/s
GivenAnswer:
Kugira ngo tubane iki kibazo, tukoresha umwanzuro wa Lorentz:

F = qvBsin(θ)

Aho:
- F ni imbaraga ya Lorentz
- q ni iyiciro ya proton (1.6 × 10^-19 C)
- v ni umuvuduko wa proton
- B ni magnitude ya kibuga cya magnetique (1.5 T)
- θ ni imfuruka hagati y'umuvuduko wa proton na kibuga cya magnetique (30°)

Kuri iyi ngingo, tukoresha umwanzuro wa Lorentz kugira ngo tubane umuvuduko wa proton nyuma yo kwinjira mu kibuga cya magnetique:

F = qvBsin(θ)
v = F / (qBsin(θ))
v = (1.6 × 10^-19 C) × (1.5 T) × sin(30°) / (1.6 × 10^-19 C)
v = 7.5 × 10^-6 m/s

Kandi iyi ni igisubizo B.

Question:

B.ubwihindurize
C.Bye bye behavior
D.Bye bye psychonalytic
GivenAnswer:

Ubwihindurize (Postmodernism) ni imitekerereze yaguye cyane mu mpera z'ikinyejana cya 20 mu Burayi. Iyi myumvire igira aho ihuriye n'ubwihinduka bw'imyumvire y'abantu ku bijyanye n'ubumenyi, ubuzima, n'imiterere y'umuryango.

Ubwihindurize bwatangiye kugaragara nk'igisubizo ku myumvire y'imbere y'icyo gihe nk'ubumenyi bw'ibyiyumviro (Psychoanalysis) n'ubumenyi bw'imyitwarire (Behaviorism). Iyi myumvire yari ifite aho ihuriye n'imyumvire y'imbere y'icyo gihe, ariko ubwihindurize bwagize ingaruka zikomeye ku myumvire y'abantu ku bijyanye n'ubumenyi n'imiterere y'umuryango.
